text: This is a list of airports in Tunisia, sorted by location. __TOC__ == List == Enfidha – Hammamet International Airport Tozeur - Nefta International Airport Tunis - Carthage International Airport ICAO location identifiers link to airport page at Office de l'Aviation Civile et des Aeroports (OACA), the Tunisian Civil Aviation & Airports Authority. Airport names shown in bold indicate the airport has scheduled service on commercial airlines. {| class="wikitable sortable" style="font-size:95%" |- style="vertical-align:top; font-weight:bold; background:#ddd;" | City | Governorate | ICAO | IATA | Airport name | Coordinates |- valign=top | Bizerte | Bizerte | DTTB | | Bizerte-Sidi Ahmed Air Base (military) | |- valign=top | Borj El Amri | Manouba | DTTI | | Borj El Amri Airport | |- valign=top | Djerba | Medenine | DTTJ | DJE | Djerba - Zarzis International Airport | |- valign=top | El Borma Oil Field | Tataouine | DTTR | EBM | El Borma Airport | |- valign=top | Enfidha | Sousse | DTNH | NBE | Enfidha – Hammamet International Airport | |- valign=top | Gabès | Gabès | DTTG | GAE | Gabès - Matmata International Airport (civil/military) | |- valign=top | Gafsa | Gafsa | DTTF | GAF | Gafsa - Ksar International Airport (civil/military) | |- valign=top | Kasserine | Kasserine | | | Thelepte Airfield | |- valign=top | Monastir | Monastir | DTMB | MIR | Monastir - Habib Bourguiba International Airport | |- valign=top | Remada | Tataouine | DTTD | | Remada Air Base (military) | |- valign=top | Sfax | Sfax | DTTX | SFA | Sfax - Thyna International Airport | |- valign=top | Tabarka | Jendouba | DTKA | TBJ | Tabarka–Ain Draham International Airport | |- valign=top | Tozeur | Tozeur | DTTZ | TOE | Tozeur - Nefta International Airport | |- valign=top | Tunis | Tunis | DTTA | TUN | Tunis - Carthage International Airport | |- valign=top | Soliman | Nabeul | | | Soliman Airstrip | |} == See also == * Transport in Tunisia * Tunisian Air Force * List of airports by ICAO code: D#DT - Tunisia * Wikipedia:WikiProject Aviation/Airline destination lists: Africa#Tunisia == References == * Office de l'Aviation Civile et des Aeroports (OACA) at Tunisian Ministry of Transport * * Tunisia Airports Airports Tunisia
title: List of airports in Tunisia
